mapper.select: select productCode, productName, productEngName, category, productOption, productUnit, productRate, wishCount from milkyproductinfo join milkyproductdetail using(productcode) order by productCode
select productCode, productName, entercount, sellcount from milkystock join milkyproductinfo using(productcode) order by productCode
